title: Amazon’s new Alexa+ feature adds conversational AI to Ring doorbells
summary: Amazon said that the feature uses the Ring doorbell's video descriptions to determine who the person in front the camera is based on their uniform, actions, and what they are holding.

summary: In an economy where everyone's feeling squeezed, AI-driven price testing of kitchen essentials was bound to attract attention.

summary: The lawsuit is just the latest in a string of copyright-related legal complaints aimed at the AI industry.

title: Jared Isaacman confirmed as next head of NASA
summary: Isaacman will run the space agency at a time when Trump is trying to both downsize it and task it with returning astronauts to the moon.

title: YouTube to pull music data from Billboard’s charts because it doesn’t like its ranking formula
summary: YouTube takes its ball and goes home by pulling Billboard's access to its music data.

title: YouTube will stream the Oscars — exclusively — beginning in 2029
summary: The news highlights YouTube's growing dominance in the television space and a major shift as streaming takes on more live events.

title: Meta is pausing its dream of sharing Quest’s Horizon OS with third-party headset makers
summary: The company said that it would revisit opportunities for third-party partnerships in the future.

title: Cisco says Chinese hackers are exploiting its customers with a new zero-day
summary: Cisco said it discovered a Chinese hacking campaign targeting its customers by exploiting a zero-day in some of the company's most popular products.

title: Facebook is testing a link-posting limit for professional accounts and pages
summary: Meta said that the test impacts professional accounts and pages on Facebook.

title: Amazon appoints longtime AWS exec Peter DeSantis to lead new AI org
summary: DeSantis has spent 27 years at Amazon, including eight years as an SVP for AWS, the cloud provider that powers about one-third of the internet.

title: Rad Power Bikes files for bankruptcy and is looking to sell the business
summary: It's the latest e-bike company to seek bankruptcy protection after pandemic-era excitement for the category wore off.

title: Radiant Nuclear raises $300M for its semi-sized 1 MW reactor
summary: Radiant Nuclear is developing a small modular reactor to replace diesel generators. The startup previously raised $165 million in May.

summary: The Bluesky contact-matching feature is opt-in and your data won't be used to spam your friends, the social network says.
